events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the software engineer position through the online portal, providing a detailed resume outlining their experience in backend development and cloud technologies.
The application was reviewed by the recruitment team and categorised under Engineering due to the candidate's extensive software development background and relevant skills like Java and AWS.
A recruiter specializing in IT and engineering roles was assigned to manage this candidate’s recruitment process and coordinate the upcoming screening and interview steps.

Recruiter conducted a phone screening to assess the candidate’s technical knowledge, communication skills, and overall suitability for the software engineer role, noting strong expertise in microservices architecture.

The candidate promptly responded to the screening feedback expressing enthusiastic interest in proceeding to technical interviews and readiness to share portfolio projects demonstrating their software engineering capabilities.
A technical interview was scheduled with the engineering team for next Monday, including coding exercises and system design problems tailored to the candidate’s expertise in distributed systems.
